function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respondents missing spending time outdoors","Impact":"Reduced mental and physical well-being, potential increase in sedentary behavior","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor activities, create accessible green spaces, encourage social interaction in outdoor settings","Technologies":"Outdoor activity tracking apps, virtual reality nature experiences","People":"General public","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Relationship between visitation frequency and missing UGS","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being for those who never visited UGS during pandemic","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize regular visitation to UGS, offer programs to encourage UGS visitation","Technologies":"UGS visitation tracking apps, community engagement platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Word matrix analysis revealing common terms related to nature and urbanization","Impact":"Reflects the importance of nature in urban environments, indicates public interest in green spaces within cities","Mitigation":"Prioritize urban green spaces in city planning, invest in urban nature preservation and accessibility","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, urban green space mapping technology","People":"City planners, urban developers, environmental organizations","Owner":"City planning departments, environmental agencies, urban development firms"}]}
